About

Hello! My name is Marcel Alexandru Nitan, I am 22 years old and I am from Suceava, Romania. I studied automotive electronics at Alexandru Ioan Cuza High School, and I finished 12th grade but failed to get the baccalaureate.

I am calm, attentive, and I am always ready to learn new things. I adapt easily to the requirements of the job and I am a person who believes in the expansion of knowledge and experience.

Some of my hobbies are computers and programming. Currently, I know 2 programming languages: Python with 3 years experience and C # with 6 months experience.
